root.name: Sega Casino Games
root.description: OverviewCasino Games includes five different game modes for players, based on those found at venues along the Las Vegas strip. These include:BlackjackPokerBaccaratSlotsPinballThe pinball mode is the exception, as it doesn't cost money to play and no money can be earned for scoring well. Otherwise, the goal of the game is to earn as much money as possible through the various gambling opportunities afforded until a goal amount is reached and the ending is triggered.
